rows.label: qev086301_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah! We have a customer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0002
rows.name: Customer who has been waiting forever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0003
rows.name: Meh?! Why is Tora at L's shop?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0004
rows.name: Tora shopping, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Indeed, indeed, good Nopon.
Now, what is it we can help you find?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0006
rows.name: Tora in dire need of secret ancient Nopon remedy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_JNK0010
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev086301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask if someone is sick.

rows.label: qev086301_JNK0020
rows.name: Doubt

rows.label: qev086301_SEL0021
rows.name: Wonder aloud if he's going to flip it for a profit.

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0007
rows.name: Very sick.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0008
rows.name: Oh no... Who need this remedy, Tora?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0009_m
rows.name: Hmph! Tora not that kind of Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0009_f
rows.name: Hmph! Tora not that kind of Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0010
rows.name: Tora not smart enough to think up such scheme anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0011
rows.name: Friends can trust Tora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0012
rows.name:
Tora smarter than Tatsu.
Most rocks on Mira smarter than Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0013
rows.name: Heir to Nopon future suffering from terrible sickness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0014
rows.name: That sounds serious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0015
rows.name: We can only pray we have what you need in stock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0016
rows.name: Mmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0017
rows.name:
No good. Tall blue friend does not have
secret ancient Nopon remedy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0018
rows.name: Well, it is "secret" after all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0019
rows.name: Luckily Tora clever Nopon who know recipe for remedy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0020
rows.name: Tora just need help finding ingredients.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0021
rows.name: We would be most happy to aid you, good sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0022
rows.name:
And we are sure Elma and her merry band
would be pleased to assist as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0023
rows.name: Sure, we'll do all we can to help you gather what you need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0024
rows.name: Hurray! Nopon future saved![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086301_MSG0025
rows.name: Thank you, friends. First, Tora need these two ingredients...[ST:wait ]
